executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Focus tests on the Astro dynamic builder route `/build/[...component].astro` that renders React components via `DynamicWrapper` and `getDynamicComponent`. Include cases:
1) Navigate to /build/home and assert the Home component renders with text "Dashboard" and "Vendite totali".
2) Navigate to /build/dashboard/test-tracker and assert the TestTracker component renders with title "Test Tracker" and list items including "Write tests".
3) Navigate to /build/examples/non-existent (or any clearly missing component) and assert the DynamicWrapper error UI appears with heading "Error loading component".
4) Optional: Navigate using kebab-case (/build/dashboard/test-tracker) to validate kebab-to-PascalCase mapping in builder.
Use Testing Library queries (getByText) robustly with case-insensitive matching.
Assume dev server on http://localhost:4321.
